item.title: Guacamole
item.description: I lived in New Mexico for 6 years and learned a few things, but probably none so valuable as making incredible guacamole. ü•± TL;DR (read on for the long version) Mash up two avocados in a bowl Add minced red or white onion, jalape√±o, garlic (small clove or 1/2), juice of 1/2 a lime, and 1/2 tsp salt Mix well.

item.title: Black beans
item.description: This is a base black bean recipe that can be used for everything.
